help.short: Name of Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node.
Name of Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise resource.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="cacheNodePropertiesDetailsIssuesList">
<prop type="array" name="driveConfiguration">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="issuesList">
<prop type="array" name="cidrCsv">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details" identifiers="message target">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node.
Name of Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise resource.
Name of Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node.
Name of Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise resource.
Resource creation method of mcc cache node resource, cli or portal

Geo-location of the cache node. This should be the same as Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise resource. When not specified, location of Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise resource will be used.
Cache node resource current Cidr range precedence selection type.
Cache node resource customer resource Asn (autonomous system number)
Cache node resource customer index as string.
Cache node resource customer resource name.
FQDN (fully qualified domain name) value of the cache node
Cache node resource Azure fully qualified resource Id.
IP address of host machine.
Cache node resource flag for indicating if cache node is enabled.
Cache node resource flag for determining if managed by enterprise as boolean.
Cache node resource maximum allowed egress in Mbps.
Cache node resource flag for determining if customer will be migrated.
Mcc response status code.
Mcc response status details for retrieving response inner details.
Mcc response status text as string for retrieving status details.
Resource tags.

<prop type="array" name="cacheNodePropertiesDetailsIssuesList">

<prop type="array" name="cidrCsv">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details" identifiers="message target">

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$resource.properties.additionalCacheNodeProperties.cacheNodePropertiesDetailsIssuesList" options="cache-node-properties-details-issues-list" group="Configuration">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$resource.properties.additionalCacheNodeProperties.driveConfiguration" options="cache-drive" group="Configuration">
